content_blocks.title: Encryption Fundamentals

content.text: This lesson covers Symmetric encryption, Asymmetric encryption, Hashing, Keys. You'll learn the fundamentals and practical applications.

content_blocks.simplified_explanation: Think of this like Symmetric encryption in everyday life...
content_blocks.real_world_connection: In real-world scenarios, Symmetric encryption is used daily by security professionals.
content_blocks.reflection_prompt: What questions do you have about this topic?

post_assessment.question: What is symmetric encryption?
post_assessment.explanation: Symmetric encryption uses the SAME key to encrypt and decrypt data (like AES).
